projects.title: Global Q2C Integrations (FIS)
projects.description: Modernized FIS's global Quote-to-Cash process: delivered 6+ end-to-end integrations connecting CRM, Billing, and ERP across EU, US, and APAC.

projects.title: RFQ-to-Invoice Automation (Sago)
projects.description: Automated RFQ-to-Invoice workflows and shortened quote-to-invoice cycle by ~10 days through API-driven workflow automation.

projects.title: Artist Collaboration Module (Songdew)
projects.description: Re-designed user journey for artist collaborations, reducing drop-off by ~15% and increasing feature participation.
